reviews.review_text:
The Fish Thali at Sea Horse Restaurant is perfect for seafood lovers. It features fresh, well-seasoned fish, either fried or in a spiced gravy, accompanied by rice, chapati, and flavorful coconut-based curries. The tangy sol kadi and vegetable sides add to the authentic coastal experience.

The portions are generous, and the flavors are balanced, offering a true taste of Indiaâ€™s coastal cuisine. The service is quick and friendly, while the relaxed setting makes it an ideal spot to unwind .

With its reasonable pricing and high-quality seafood, Sea Horse Restaurant's Fish Thali is a must-try for anyone craving a satisfying, budget-friendly meal.

It's a  home made food  restaurant.
Food was fresh & testey.
I tried their Veg thali & fish thali
It satisfied my hunger.

It is truly a hidden gem. Quite location, typical Goan ambience and good food what else you want.
I tried fish thali and pomfret fry which was the best. Amazingly finger licking food with a quiet ambience. Loved this place.
